metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11685 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the function compileHyphenation in compileTranslationTable.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4
liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4
liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4
python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4
python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-2ubuntu1.4').
